mapper.insert: insert into user_table (id, password, name, birth, email, phone, gender, schoolAbility, question, answer, point, grade, img, sumLike, delCheck) values (#{id}, #{password}, #{name}, #{birth}, #{email}, #{phone}, #{gender}, #{schoolAbility}, #{question}, #{answer}, 0, 'B', #{img}, 0, 'N')
mapper.select: select id, password, name, birth, email, phone, gender, schoolAbility, question, answer, point, grade, img, sumLike, delCheck from user_table where id = #{value}
select id, password, name, birth, email, phone, gender, schoolAbility, question, answer, point, grade, img, sumLike, delCheck from user_table where phone = #{value}
